task.title: How to make a cup of tea

context.p: You are in a well equipped kitchen with a packet of tea bags to hand. You wish to make a cup of tea using a

step.cmd: Bring a kettle of water to the boil
Place a tea bag in an insulated glass
Pour hot water over the tea bag until the glass is 80% full
Place the glass in a microwave oven and power for 30 seconds.
